statements: SELECT * FROM tax_payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT client_id, tax_type, tax_amount FROM tax_payment_history WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT tax_type, SUM(tax_amount) AS total_tax_amount FROM tax_payment_history GROUP BY tax_type;
SELECT * FROM tax_payment_history WHERE client_id = 1001 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, tax_amount FROM tax_payment_history ORDER BY tax_amount ASC;
SELECT client_id, tax_type, tax_amount, payment_date, payment_method FROM tax_payment_history WHERE tax_type='Income Tax' ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT client_id, tax_type, tax_amount FROM tax_payment_history WHERE tax_type='Property Tax' ORDER BY tax_amount DESC
SELECT client_id, tax_type, tax_amount, payment_date FROM tax_payment_history WHERE client_id=100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT tax_type FROM tax_payment_history ORDER BY tax_type
SELECT client_id, SUM(tax_amount) AS total_tax_paid FROM tax_payment_history GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_tax_paid > 5000 ORDER BY total_tax_paid DESC
SELECT * FROM tax_payments WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM tax_payments WHERE tax_year = 2022;
SELECT client_name, tax_year FROM clients JOIN tax_payments ON clients.client_id = tax_payments.client_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM tax_payments WHERE client_id = 1 AND tax_year = 2021 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM tax_payments GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM clients WHERE client_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(amount) AS total_paid FROM clients LEFT JOIN tax_payments ON clients.client_id = tax_payments.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT tax_year, AVG(amount) AS avg_payment FROM tax_payments GROUP BY tax_year HAVING AVG(amount) > 5000 ORDER BY tax_year DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM tax_clients;
SELECT payment_id, client_id, payment_amount FROM tax_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, tax_amount FROM tax_clients WHERE tax_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'update' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id, client_name, tax_amount FROM tax_clients WHERE tax_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM tax_clients;
SELECT client_name, tax_amount FROM tax_clients WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, payment_amount FROM tax_clients JOIN tax_payments ON tax_clients.client_id = tax_payments.client_id;
SELECT client_name, payment_amount, log_date FROM tax_clients JOIN tax_payments ON tax_clients.client_id = tax_payments.client_id JOIN audit_log ON tax_clients.client_id = audit_log.client_id;
SELECT client_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM tax_clients JOIN tax_payments ON tax_clients.client_id = tax_payments.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT * FROM tax_history;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT amount, tax_year FROM tax_history ORDER BY tax_year DESC;
SELECT client_id, action_timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'login' LIMIT 10;
SELECT note_text FROM client_notes WHERE note_date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT * FROM tax_history WHERE client_id = 'abc123' AND tax_year = 2022;
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) FROM tax_history GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_id, client_name, address, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 'def456';
SELECT * FROM client_notes ORDER BY note_date DESC;
SELECT action, action_timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE client_id = 'xyz789' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE tax_id > 100
SELECT client_name, tax_id FROM Client WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM Client WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM Client ORDER BY client_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE tax_id = 12345;
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM Client WHERE client_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, tax_id FROM Client WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY tax_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_clients FROM Client;
SELECT AVG(tax_id) AS avg_tax_id FROM Client;
